text: Dean Carroll Jones (January 25, 1931 – September 1, 2015) was an American actor. He was born in Decatur, Alabama. Jones was best known for his light- hearted leading roles in several Walt Disney movies between 1965 and 1977. He was known for his roles in The Love Bug and in Beethoven. Jones died from Parkinson's disease in Los Angeles, California, aged 84. ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 1956 Somebody Up There Likes Me Private in Rocky's Tent Uncredited 1956 These Wilder Years Hardware Clerk 1956 Tea and Sympathy Ollie 1956 The Opposite Sex Assistant Stage Manager Uncredited 1956 The Rack Lieutenant Uncredited 1956 The Great American Pastime Buck Rivers 1957 Slander Newscaster Uncredited 1957 Ten Thousand Bedrooms Dan 1957 Designing Woman Assistant Stage Manager (Boston) Uncredited 1957 Until They Sail US Marine Lt.
